subject: Need advanced segmentation options
description: We need more granular segmentation options for our email campaigns. Current options are too basic for our needs.

subject: Request for API rate limit increase
description: We need higher API rate limits for our integration. Current limits are too restrictive.

subject: Integration with Salesforce failing
description: Our Salesforce integration is not syncing contact data properly. Missing 200+ contacts.

subject: Documentation is outdated
description: The API documentation is outdated and missing key endpoints. Need updated docs ASAP.

subject: Email template editor bug
description: Email template editor is not saving changes properly. Lost 3 hours of work.

subject: Request for A/B testing improvements
description: Current A/B testing features are too basic. Need more advanced statistical analysis.

subject: Request for custom reporting
description: Need custom reporting capabilities that our current plan doesn't include.

subject: API authentication errors
description: Our API keys are being rejected intermittently. This is causing our integrations to fail.

subject: Slow response times
description: API response times have increased significantly over the past month. This is affecting our application performance.

subject: Request for webhook support
description: We need webhook support for real-time data synchronization. This is critical for our use case.
